hospital.name: General Hospital
hospital.address: 123 Health St, Wellness City, Health Country

condition.name: Asthma
condition.description: A condition in which your airways narrow and swell and may produce extra mucus.

therapy.name: Inhaled Corticosteroids
therapy.description: Medications to help reduce inflammation and prevent asthma attacks.

symptom.name: Throat irritation
symptom.description: A mild irritation or soreness in the throat.

factor.name: Allergies
factor.description: Having allergic reactions can trigger asthma symptoms.

drug.name: Albuterol
drug.description: A medication that opens up the medium and large airways in the lungs.
